metadata.name: Un tipo como tú (A guy like you)
metadata.description:
Un tipo como tú (A guy like you), 2022
Directed, stared and produced by Ava.

The film, which was presented at various events, received widespread critical acclaim for its poignant message. It went on to win the "Premio Sara Gomez de Mejor Cortometraje" at the esteemed first observatory of Latinoamerican women filmmakers (1 OLAR) in Brazil and was featured at the prestigious "Festival Internacional Del Nuevo Cine Latinoamericano de La Habana."

The profits generated from this NFT sale will be used by the filmaker to produce a documentary that delves into the lives of the trans community in Havana, Cuba
